nl.inl.blacklab.search.indexmetadata

Interface AnnotatedFields

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<AnnotatedField>

    public interface AnnotatedFields
extends Iterable<AnnotatedField>
    Annotated fields on a BlackLab index

    • Method Detail

      • main

        AnnotatedField main()
        The main contents field in our index. This is either the annotated field with the name "contents", or if that doesn't exist, the first annotated field found.
        Returns:
        the main contents field

      • iterator

        Iterator<AnnotatedField> iterator()
        Iterate over the annotated fields in our index.

      • get

        AnnotatedField get(String fieldName)
        Get the description of one annotated field
        Parameters:
        fieldName - name of the field
        Returns:
        the field description, or null if it doesn't exist

      • exists

        boolean exists(String fieldName)
        Does the specified field exist?
        Parameters:
        fieldName - field name
        Returns:
        true if it exists, false if not
